name: Từ vựng Tiếng Anh hoạt động đi làm/đi học (Work/School Activities)

words.example: I go to work early every morning.

words.vietnamese: Đi làm/đi học (hàng ngày, quãng đường xa)
words.example: Many people commute long distances to their jobs.
I need to work hard to finish this project, and students study for their exams.
We will have a meeting to discuss the new proposal.
Let's take a break and get some coffee.
I usually have lunch with my colleagues at noon.
I finish work at 5 PM, and then I pick up my kids from school.
After a long day, I just want to go home and relax.
